participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: kind-hearted and nurturing, with a penchant for creativity.
participant_1.background: I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I love to eat shrimp and lobster. I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set. My favorite tv show is game of thrones.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and artistic, constantly seeking new forms of expression.
participant_2.background: I love my pets and my job, and I'm always looking for new ways to express my creativity with bold hair colors. I was once offered to play basketball professionally. My family came from Greece in the 1950s. I eat my feelings. I am an avid quilter.

content.text: Not much, just been watching some Game of Thrones, how about you?
I love that show! I'm currently in the process of quilting a blanket.
That's so cool! I wish I could quilt.
It's not so hard, you should give it a try!
I might just have to do that. I love to make things.
What kinds of things do you like to make?
I like to bake, cook, and I love to garden.
Baking is my favorite too! I'm not a very good cook, but I love to eat.
I'm not a great cook either, but I love to try new recipes.
What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make chocolate cake!
Oh my gosh, chocolate cake is my favorite too!
Well, we have to be friends now.
